description: A modern monument to baseball around the globe, Ciudad de Colores is a vibrant, colorful stadium filled with art that celebrates the joining of old and new in the heart of a massive city. Feel the energy as you step up to the plate and admire the excitement of the crowd, picture-perfect natural landscape outside its walls, and an atmosphere made for baseball.
